title: UK’s Tax Cuts Trigger Crash
itunes:title: UK’s Tax Cuts Trigger Crash
description:
Bloomberg News Senior UK Economics Reporter Philip Aldrick explains how the UK’s biggest tax cuts since 1972 triggered a crash in the pound and bonds. Bloomberg News Legal Reporter Joel Rosenblatt discusses his Businessweek Magazine story When The Scrolling Doesn't Stop: Social Media Lawsuits Pile Up. Denelle Dixon, CEO and Executive Director of the Stellar Development Foundation, shares her thoughts on the Digital Commodities Consumer Protection Act and regulating cryptocurrencies. And we Drive to the Close with Ben Cook, Portfolio Manager at Hennessy Advisors.
Hosts: Tim Stenovec and Katie Greifeld. Producer: Paul Brennan.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
